A banquet hall, function hall, or reception hall, is a special purpose room, or a building, used for hosting large social and business events. Typically a banquet hall is capable of serving dozens to hundreds of people a meal in a timely fashion. People and organizations rent them to hold parties, banquets, wedding receptions, or other social events. Businesses rent them to hold sales meetings, employee training events, employee awards events, and corporate celebrations and parties.

Banquet halls are often found within pubs, nightclubs, hotels, or restaurants.

The first recorded mention of "function rooms" is in 1922. [1][2]

They are distinct from other halls, in that they have no religious of government affiliation. Most are run by commercial enterprises, though are run by fraternal organizations and are part of their building, available for rent by the general public, for example Masonic Halls.
We visited the restaurant. The food served here is only Veg. Awesome food , awesome ambience
Perfect venue to host a party gathering of 250 plus people.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Prakash
address: Tiwari Tola, Basti, Uttar Pradesh 272002, India

reviews.text:
The hotel is located at a convenient place.
I used to stay only here whenever I would visit Basti which is my native district.
During 2011-12, I had stayed here in a AC fitted room 101 for about 6 months together ie Oct '11 to March 2012.
I liked everything except Food . I would take breakfast regularly here and teas whenever required but not the Lunch and Dinner since there was not at all any change in the menu. One cannot get anything else on order other than what is prepared daily. Even for Breakfast, evening snacks, etc, only few certain things are prepared daily. So, if one stays for more than one day, he will have to search something out of the hotel.
So for food, I was going about 2 km away to a different hotel.

2. Tea: Tea is not available in the morning when one really wants it after getting up and I had to go out for morning tea. I think, tea makers come from their own residence to the hotel quite late.

2(1): While tea was earlier served in a pot accompanied with 2 proper sized cups and saucers, this practice was snapped when I stayed after first long stay.  This time, they supplied tea in a cup which means one has to finish it immediately after its served.
I disliked this manner of service very much.
Not only this, cup size was so much reduced that it could be called "cutting tea".  How can a few spoonful of tea be sufficient in the morning and with the breakfast!
This miserliness was really big irritant.
I used to suggest and give feedback but owner was probably too much conscious of cost cutting and gaining more income through such means. I remember, price of tea had been increased.

Last Visit on 13 March 2019:  During this period ie from 2011 to March 2019, I used to ring the reception person while starting for Basti about my intent to stay and they would always book the same room 101 for me.
This room as well as other rooms had had geyser in the bathroom.
However, on 14 March '19 morning I got no hot water, no geyser.
Then on calling reception some one told that hot water supply was on till 7 am or 8 am through boiler and that they will arrange a bucket of hot water separately.
They were giving  completely false information and deliberately. What is use of such a miserly hotel which makes stories and dodge the clients?
I cannot stay in such a hotel which thinks of maximizing it's income alone  without thinking of clients' comforts.
I immediately left the hotel without taking bath and went to my house in my another village that is located 94 km away from Basti.
Since then,ie last 5 years I have not stayed in this hotel.
This is my feedback which I am sure hotel will find correct.

Highly professional...good food.. cleanliness can be better...best hotel for staying in Basti ...negotiation is minimum..good support of generator in case of power cut ..newly renovated rooms..easily accessible to roadways and trains

Pro:
👉🏻They have their own" khana khazana restaurant" and the food is amazing, Delicious, tasty, wonderful.
👉🏻Good sun face location.

Cons:
👉🏻Hot water is not available for bathing, neither staff nor anyone cares. They will tell you to just wait and you will remain waiting for the whole day.
👉🏻Regular drinking water is hard to get.

Overall you can book this hotel, it's good for both couples and families
Very good Hotel and Restaurant in Basti on Station Road. The food Quality is Good and Room facilities are also very good.
Food is good but service is too slow it took 1 hour to just serve the starters if you have too much free time u can come

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel maharaja | Best Hotel in Basti | Hotel in Basti
address: pikura shiv gulam, Malviya Rd, Pach Pedia, Basti, Uttar Pradesh 272001, India

reviews.text: Higher priced rooms are good. Air conditioner is in good condition and working. If there is no power, generator will be turned on lately in day time. Room service boys enters forcefully immediately after pressing Bell. I am not satisfied with my stay because hotel management allowed SET TOP BOX repair person at night 10.00 pm. I don't know whether they come for set top box repair or to check what I am doing. I am doing work in my laptop. Worst fellows.

Best hotel in basti city available service, rooms AC/ Non AC both and banquet hall for meeting, kitty party etc.
Environment very good 👍 co-operative staff rooms are very clean and high genic.
Restaurant are available.
Located at Malveey Road basti just before 1 km form basti roadways bus station 🚉 when comming from badeban side.
Main entrance on Malveey Road
The hotel here is near the bus stand and railway station and you can get a good room in very low rupees

The hotel is self proclaimed as beautiful, modern, and spacious. The hotel also claims to be rated as a “Four Diamond” hotel. The hotel offers some great amenities like, family rooms, room service, free breakfast, a fitness center, a swimming pool, a restaurant, meeting rooms, non-smoking rooms, etc. I stayed at this hotel about two years ago, and the appearance of the hotel is nice but if you look a little harder you will find some major flaws. Although claimed as a great hotel and with abundant., my experience at this hotel was horrible because the hotel has a bug infestation, mechanical problems throughout the building, and the management and service they provided was poor.

While visiting this hotel with my family , I came across some problems. First I was in my hotel room when I discovered a small cockroach, and after bringing this to the manager’s attention, she plead I did not tell the rest of the team member and their families. The management agreed to wash all of our belongings and give us a new room because the surrounding hotels were all booked out. So we agreed, we returned from a hockey game only to find we were not move to a new room yet. The manager apologized and were only able to give us a room two doors down from the original one. When we arrived at our new room we opened the door, clicked the light on and there were two, large cockroaches on the ceiling. We contacted the manager once again, this time she was in tears apologizing and due to the other local hotels being so full we had to stay. The manager moved us again, this time five rooms in the other direction, this room had no cockroaches but the heat didn’t work. We just wanted extra blankets, so we called to the front desk for them and they sent us blankets and some food
. Next morning , we are left this hotel....
Good byee....
Service is good everything you will get on time. Ac rooms having window ac are seriously noisy.

reviews.text:
A good place to stay in Basti (UP)
Rooms are spacious location is good
Staffs are good .....survice is good .
In terms of money it is a budget friendly.

Especially  Saurabh is very helpful guy  who is on the reception .......💚
The mutton biryani was fabulous. I liked the quality of service as well.

Pathetic Reception. Took a safe escape before checking in.
Booked room on call which got confirmed. Reached location asked for booking. The staff was behaving very rude like he is the saviour for me. Asking silly questions who, why, don't know like we are in need. Also quoted a high price in very arrogant manner. On the same moment I moved back.
Please don't prefer until there is an emergency.
Rooms are good. Location is okay okay. But service is very poor. But quite economical. Can't expect much at this price.

Is a very gopd hotel the interior and the waiters here are very good. The hotel allows for a noght stay for whole family or 1person. This hotel is having a variety of dishes and food. Starters ,afternoons and dinner are easily available any time.

Last time I had visiten here with my family member and next day with my friend.
But I was dissatisfied with the staff behavior,  they never attend guest in the good manner. They give smile like they're making joke of guests and they are not treating a particular person, They are treating everyone in this way. And as it is the new and  reputative hotel in the basti ,it was the bad impression for the guest and it will always affect your reviews. Should suggest to improve your staff behavior and teach them how to attend the guest in the hotels.

It looks like they are hiring daily wage laborers, not hotel staff.

If the AC breaks down then they do not have any staff available even the fan is not available in the room

The intercom of the room is out of order

My room number is 112 & after 1 am it's 209

At the time of check out, there was no staff present who could bill or who knew how to bill.

It was the worst hotel. Receptionists were very rude and unprofessional. They don't know how to treat guests. Seems like a 10th pass staff. Rooms were dirty and in poor condition. Walls were rotten and ceiling had the seapage. AC was not working and they don't provide AC remote to guests to control it. And you can't use AC during the city power cut as they don't have power backup or budget for it. But they are charging full for it. Images shown in website and Google are old and misleading. Don't ever think about to use this hotel. Go to some dharamshala instead of it, they may have better facilities and staff. Very rude behaviour by the staff.
Disgusting place to be please avoid this property manager doesn't know how to talk and the owner doesn't even care about guests.

reviews.text: If possible i gave this hotel in minus(-5). Very bad experience of my entire life. You have to wait at least 3 hrs for drinking water, 4 hrs for cleaning, although contact to reception continuously. No any hospitality provided by the staff, very rude staff, doesn't have any manner to conversation with customer. I request to you all that naver come in this worst hotel.

Everything is fine and the hospitality is great. Also the food is mouth-watering and the preparation is excellent. Specially hotel receptionist behaviour is too good
Reception

One of the Best Hotels of Basti. Located at prime location very close to Basti Railway. So a very good place to come and rest after a long flight. One of the highlights of this place is long walking payements with side trees. Very broad drive ways.
2 Banquet Halls for Meeting or Wedding etc.
Dinning Area
-Amazing Rooms starting with very pocket friendly rates.
-Very Big Parking Space

We were happy to find this place because rooms are good and not that expensive, but not so clean.

But what a horrible night we had because of noise. Staff just ignored us, and our complaints, all the night. Honestly, avoid this hotel.

We had a tent. I guess we would had a better night if we camped in the parking...

Had to give this Hotel One Star because there's no option for zero star.
The worst hotel I have ever stayed in. A hotel with the worst...the worst room service. The worst staff. No preference to customer comfortability. Even after complimentary breakfast added to my booking the receptionist lied to me that there's no.complimentary breakfast and I will have to pay for the breakfast.
A simple order for food takes at least 40 to 45 minutes to reach your house. The rooms are not well maintained.
The hotel staff will do nothing to resolve your issue they will just simply neglect saying "sir ab sab insaan hai".
My worst experience. No at all happy. Won't recommend this hotel to anyone.
